articles.title: 53 points after 24 games: Milan equaled their second ever points record
articles.summary: Milan (53 in the current championship) equaled its second best performance after the first 24 seasonal matches in Serie A in the 3 points per win era, as in 1995/96 (53) and behind only the 61 points in 2003/04. Opta reports it.

articles.title: Como, Fabregas: "We must try to win and then prepare Milan"
articles.summary: (ANSA) - MILAN, FEBRUARY 13 - "We must try to win tomorrow, to win the match and then prepare Milan. We must not think about the others, we must concentrate only on ourselves.

articles.summary: (ANSA) - TUDOR, FEBRUARY 13 - Igor Tudor restarts from the Premier League. The former Juventus manager has accepted the role of interim manager of Tottenham until the end of the season.
